title: Slow Cooker Spaghetti Bolognese Sauce
ingredients: ['450g lean mince beef', '4 tins chopped or peeled tomatoes', '4 tablespoons tomato puree', '1 large onion, chopped', '4 stalks celery, chopped', '1 fresh green pepper, chopped', '1 fresh red pepper, chopped', '15 button mushrooms, sliced', 'Dried Italian herbs or Italian seasoning, to taste', '4 bay leaves', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '450g spaghetti']
